topic.title: The test topic in a sub subgroup.
topic.body: How much inclusions can there be? Inception anyone?

1616966234_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk.body:

1549373688_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4.body: What does the `user status` means? I.e. being Administrator gives you any privileges? What exactly does this string next to nickname indicates?

I'm experimenting with green colors [here](/16oqgvzF1KNTNX8EXNW5otvK4iFKBCGpTk/) (this is a test playground). It's really not so hard to change blue colors to green, but to add dynamic color schemes will take some effort.

1635729480_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: Testing to see if avatar will be shown
Weird, it shows @geekless avatar, but mine is shown as "S" letter in a circle instead the one, used in ZeroMe profile.

> [geekless](#comment_69_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): @smashbuckler  [...]

Aha, I'm on another provider there. Oh shoot... :D
Somehow I can not choose my kaffieid profile. I forgot that I've used `swashbuckler@kaffie.bit` in ZeroMe, so this one profile is not tied to according ZeroMe profile.
Okay, now I've created a profile on zerome, let's see... I wonder how much time will it take to sync avatar from zerome
Okay, took about 5 minutes and 3-4 messages about files distribution and sync flashed in ZeroMe.
